SELECT spdt.*
, ( CASE WHEN tppr_es_i18n = 1 THEN ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'prvr' AND i18n_ext_pk = ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = spdt_prmt_pk AND #{fechaVigencia} BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, #{fechaVigencia}) ) AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) WHEN tppr_tpdt_pk IS NOT NULL THEN ( SELECT prdt_cadena FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_prvr_pk = ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = spdt_prmt_pk AND #{fechaVigencia} BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, #{fechaVigencia}) ) AND prdt_tpdt_pk = tppr_tpdt_pk ) END ) AS p18n_texto
FROM vw_subparametro_dato_spdt spdt
